data.eml:eml: Systematic revision of Central American Calligrapha Chevrolat of the subgenus Erythrographa subgen. nov. (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae, Chrysomelinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gómez-Zurita, Jesús (2018): Systematic revision of Central American Calligrapha Chevrolat of the subgenus Erythrographa subgen. nov. (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae, Chrysomelinae). Zootaxa 4531 (1): 1-58, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4531.1.1
